== Section Honours and awards ==
Due to the way the section Honours and awards is, this article has several things that I consider problematic: * The section is not usable from the TOC * The section is at the end of the article which doesn't follow common usage, see [[MOS:ORDER]] * Goes against [[Wikipedia:Accessibility_dos_and_don'ts]] ("Don't use scrolling lists or collapsible sections to conceal content.") and [[MOS:COLLAPSE]] * The section is actually short therefore there is no need for all this trouble
[[User:Aisteco|Aisteco]] ([[User talk:Aisteco|talk]]) 01:17, 27 March 2016 (UTC)
== Lead image -- comment moved from long-closed GAN page ==
I HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO COMMENT ON TALK PAGES but this is a horrible pic of joe. Can someone please upload the pic at http://www.coalandcommunity.com/resources/P01383.jpg I mean seriously wtf. [[User:Hoffies|Hoffies]] ([[User talk:Hoffies|talk]]) 03:52, 13 September 2016 (UTC)Hoffies
:That link doesn't work for me but, in any case, I see no obvious problems with the current picture. Cheers, [[User:Ian Rose|Ian Rose]] ([[User talk:Ian Rose|talk]]) 04:10, 13 September 2016 (UTC)
